description: Get out the headband: it’s time to mop up with this ground-up redesign. Our streamlined No Show Tab men’s running sock features a silky, chafe-eliminating cuff, high-performance flex zones and a supportive fit. Built with ultra-lightweight, wicking Merino Wool for all-day, marathon-mileage bids.
name: Darn Tough Socks Run No Show Tab Ultralight Socks - Mens

specs.value: Running shoes, trail runners, athletic sneakers
